void Camera::update (  ) 

This function updates the projection matrix so that it includes the camera at its current position, direction, etc. Should be called before each frame is rendered.

void Camera::spinRightAroundCenter ( GLdouble  angle  ) 

Function: spinRightAroundCenter

SpinRightAroundCenter moves (as you would expect) to the right, from the perspective of the viewer.

Parameters:
angle - the angle in degrees that you wish to rotate by

void Camera::spinUpAroundCenter ( GLdouble  angle  ) 

Function: spinUpAroundCenter

This spins you in the up direction, from the perspective of the viewer.

Parameters:
angle - the angle in degrees that you wish to spin.

void Camera::spinViewAroundCenter ( GLdouble  angle  ) 

Function: spinViewAroundCenter

This rotates the apparent view of the camera in the counter- clockwise direction. Really just changing the upDirection vector

Parameters:
angle - The angle in degrees you wish to spin

void Camera::zoomIn ( GLdouble  amount  ) 

Zoom the camera in or out, depending on value of amount

Parameters:
amount - a number between 0 and infinity. Numbers less than one zoom in, numbers greater than one zoom out

void Camera::shift ( Point3  direction,
GLdouble  amount 
)
